official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to carry out activities relating to nuclear waste repositories and the monitored retrievable storage facility in accordance with the mission plan as modified by the proposed amendment to the mission plan dated January 1987, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to implement activities relating to the first and second repositories for radioactive waste, and the monitored retrievable storage facility, in accordance with the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982 and a certain modified mission plan. Authorizes the Secretary to delay site-specific activities for a second repository subject to congressional approval.
